About Us

Licensed and insured, we offer personalized service at its best! All of our services are by appointment only. Once you become a customer, you will have unlimited contact with us, by email, text, phone, or in office consultations. We speak and work with the passion to ensure that no two events are ever the same. Let us show you how to plan a hassle-free, stress-free event!

Timeline

Our Story

  • 1988-1996

    Our Humble Beginnings

    DJ Ricardo V started DJing at the age of 13 in the South Bay. Back then it was strictly vinyl Records. It wasnâ€™t easy finding records in my neighborhood.

  • 1996-2008

    WP Records

    At the age of 21, I established my own personal DJ shop in the city of Lomita. This marked the birth of WP Records, a hub catering to all DJ needs, which operated until 2008.

  • 2008

    Event Planning

    As time changed, so did the business. It eventually transitioned into an events company. Knowing and working with so many vendors in our industry allowed us to serve our clients better as we could offer them many services under one roof.

  • 2023

    Cre8tive Wedding and Events

    Fast forward to 2023, we've been in the industry for over 25 years, specializing in DJs, MCs, and Wedding Planning. Now known as Cre8tive Weddings and Events, or Cre8tiveLA.com, your go-to for all event-related needs.

  • Be Part
    of Our
    Story!

RICARDO VELASQUEZ
Founder & CEO

DJ, MC, Professional Event Planner with over 25 years of experience.
